00027         public Fields initFields()
00028         {
00029                 FieldString key = new FieldString("Nom de clef", "key");
00030                 key.setNaturalKey(true);
00031 
00032                 FieldText value = new FieldText("Valeur", "value", false);
00033                 value.setNaturalKey(true);
00034

00036                 fieldList.add(new FieldInt("Numéro", getPrimaryKeyName()));
00037                 fieldList.add(key);
00038                 fieldList.add(value);
00039 
00040                 return new Fields(fieldList);
00041         }
